reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A stellar accessory that combines unbeatable protection, ease of application, and clarity.
reviews.reviewText: The Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector for the Galaxy Watch 6 Classic is a stellar accessory that combines unbeatable protection, ease of application, and clarity. Here's why it unquestionably deserves a full 5-star rating:Precise Fit: This screen protector is custom-tailored for the Galaxy Watch 6 Classic, ensuring a perfect fit that covers the entire screen without any annoying overhangs or misalignments.Scratch and Impact Protection: The tempered glass provides robust protection against scratches, scuffs, and even minor impacts, preserving the pristine display of your smartwatch.Crystal Clear: The high-quality glass maintains the clarity and touch sensitivity of your watch's display. You won't notice any reduction in screen quality or responsiveness.Easy Application: The GlasTR EZ FIT technology makes the application process effortless. It practically applies itself, with clear instructions that ensure a bubble-free, hassle-free installation.Durability: The tough tempered glass is designed to withstand the daily wear and tear, keeping your watch's screen in excellent condition for an extended period.Oleophobic Coating: The included oleophobic coating repels fingerprints and smudges, allowing your watch's screen to stay clean and clear even during heavy use.Value for Money: Considering the protection it offers and its longevity, this screen protector represents excellent value for your investment.Brand Reputation: Spigen is a well-regarded brand known for producing high-quality accessories, and this screen protector lives up to their reputation.In summary, the Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector for the Galaxy Watch 6 Classic is a 5-star product that provides an impeccable shield for your smartwatch's screen. It's the perfect combination of protection and optical clarity. If you want to safeguard your watch's display while maintaining its original look and feel, this screen protector is a wise choice. It's a must-have accessory for anyone looking to extend the life and aesthetics of their Galaxy Watch 6 Classic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to install, prefect fit and high quality
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend Spigen products all around, I've been using their products for years and they are all great products! The screen protector is perfect... You don't lose any touch sensitivity or area, especially on the edges. I use this Thema watch face which has 4 custom touch areas for easy access to apps, and the screen protector does not interfere with it at all. In fact it actually enhances the touch area because you can get your finger tip even closer to the edge, since the bezel is tapered and the glass sits a little higher. Buy it, you won't regret it! I'm happy to pay a little extra for the simplicity of installation and the quality you get from Spigen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good way to install watch screen protectors.
reviews.reviewText: These watch screen protectors are very easy to install and get it right the 1st time. They're very durable and offers great protection for watch screens. 👍🏾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, just wish it was a little cheaper
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased this brand for my phone (screen and camera protectors) and it was a great experience. Installation is easy and the quality seems great. This protector for the watch was the same process. It's a good width and doesn't seem to interfere with the touchscreen. My only "complaint" would be the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, once you figure it out
reviews.reviewText: I have bought these twice for my Galaxy Watch 6 44mm, as I broke the first two working on things in the garage, and banging the edge of the watch face. That precipitated a further purchase of a Spigen rubber surround, but that's a separate review.The quality of the kit is very good and the protector is virtually invisible, once installed. The video link is nearly useless. You just have to use the enclosed pictorial instructions and do the best you can. Once you do this the first time, you get really good at getting the protector on evenly.These are a bit expensive, but so is the watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Robust and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This is quite easy to install on my watch and fits perfectly the entire round screen with no gaps or any air bubbles.I tend to break my watches, because I keep hitting my hands with everything while walking, now I can say I am safe with this screen protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and keeps clean and safe
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to install and looks great. You can't even tell it's there. It really does protect against smudges and smears really well. My one issue is dirt tends to get into the small space between the screen protector and the bezel, which can be a little gross and a pain to clean. But otherwise it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what it seems!!
reviews.reviewText: Followed the instructions and ended up using both protectors. The first one did not stick and had large air bubbles tried to reuse but dust ended up after it falling out. The second one seemed to have stayed stuck onto the glass but had a very large air bubble that I had to use quite a bit of force to remove and to top it off it did not align in center even with the aligning tool, once side has a wider gap than the other. I would like to try again if Spigen will send me another box. It seemed that this one may have been old! I will update if I get a second chance.

reviews.reviewTitle: No Change to the touchscreen sensitivity.
reviews.reviewText: Crystal Clear clarity and just adds 1 more layer of safety for the screen. This is extremely easy to apply. It just works like there is no screen protector.

¡Excelente producto, me gusto mucho lo fácil que es de instalar y la guía que te dan para que quede perfecto a tu reloj, venía una palita para quitar rápidamente la burbuja que quedo al instalar, quedo muy bien!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does the job well and very easy to apply.
Som alltid med spigen så är det enkelt att få en 100% montering.
